name: Danganronpa: Halcyon to Hereafter-Prologue
description:
18 students from the established New Hope's Peak Academy find themselves in a kill or be killed game, taking place in an abandoned factory. Will the students fall into Despair? Or cherish the Hope that they have been so kindly given.

Hey there, thank you for playing Danganronpa: Halcyon to Hereafter! This is a fangame for the Danganronpa series, so if you don't know what that is, it is a series of visual novel-esque games with kill or be killed situations. This game takes place after Danganronpa 3, so please see the spoiler warning down below. Even the plot of this story has spoilers for it, so tread carefully. 

[Warning!] This game spoils the ending of: Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc, Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair and Danganronpa 3: The End of Hope's Peak High School. If you have not seen the endings or played/watched the series then please go do that before coming back here.

Comments are appreciated and small updates will happen!

EDIT: Most Bugs have been fixed. If there are anymore, please do tell me.
